summary: LRCX's Q1 earnings and revenues surpass forecasts, boosted by strong systems sales and rising demand across key Asian markets.

headline: LRCX Q3 Deep Dive: AI Demand and Memory Upgrades Drive Performance Amid China Uncertainty
summary: Semiconductor equipment maker Lam Research (NASDAQ:LRCX) announced better-than-expected revenue in Q3 CY2025, with sales up 27.7% year on year to $5.32 billion. On top of that, next quarter’s revenue guidance ($5.2 billion at the midpoint) was surprisingly good and 8% above what analysts were expecting. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.26 per share was 3.3% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Will Surging AI Demand and Strong Q1 Results Change Lam Research's (LRCX) Narrative?
summary: Lam Research reported its fiscal first-quarter 2026 results on October 22, 2025, with revenue of US$5.32 billion and net income of US$1.57 billion, both showing substantial year-over-year increases, and issued guidance for next quarter targeting revenue of about US$5.20 billion with an operating income margin near 33%. The robust results and optimistic outlook were driven by continued strong demand for advanced semiconductor equipment, particularly from the rapidly expanding AI and...
